review_data.title: Zuvorkommemder Service, Essen unmöglich

review_data.title: From Cali to Zurich
review_data.content: The waitress was really open minded, she has fulfilled every wish for us and was absolutely kind. I started my tongue journey by ordering a cranberry juice, which was totally fresh. We could order many dishes and we had the opportunity to try as many...More

review_data.title: so expensive and not many vegan options, VERY SMALL portions
review_data.content: the food is not special at all (not very contemporary either as there are not many vegan options) and very expensive and small portions. would not recommend going there.. its a typical hipster place (stylish but not worth the price and the average food).

review_data.title: Tasty and authentic
review_data.content: I've been lucky to have eaten tacos in southern California and Baja Mexico, and these are spot on for the most part. A few tweaks, as would be expected. Staff is friendly and helpful and I have been lucky (twice) to get a table without...More

review_data.title: Tacos are great for brunch also
review_data.content: Already a fan of their tacos, trying their popular brunch was also a must do and it certainly did not disappoint. The portions are not huge but this is done on purpose, the idea is ordering several dishes and sharing. The drink menu may be...More

review_data.title: Makenpflicht?
review_data.content: Covid Kontrolle gut, Service gut, Essen sehr gut, Portionen ausreichend. Doch Maskenpflicht ist maskenpflicht, gilt auch für das Personal.

review_data.title: Passer son chemin
review_data.content: Nous sommes venus suite aux avis de tripadvisor... Passer votre chemin, nous avons partagé divers plat et tout a le...More

review_data.title: Poor Quality and Overpriced
review_data.content: Overpriced for the quality of food. Food was tasteless, the guacamole’s was brown and the tacos had nothing to do or compare to real Mexican or Tex Mex food. The nachos were clear from package. If Swiss people thing this place is good perhaps they’ve...More

review_data.title: Combo taco plate for a great introduction
review_data.content: Their pop up at Zurich’s main train station gives a great introduction to the full restaurant menu. The cauliflower seemed to have been a bit undercooked but the very tasty chicken and beef tacos more than made up for it, as did the well seasoned,...More

review_data.title: Toller Abend
review_data.content: Stilvoller, hausgemachter Ice Tea, knusprige Nachos und einen Hauptgang obendrauf. War echt super! Auch die Bedienung.

review_data.title: Best Taco's in Zurich!
review_data.content: The plates are rich, full of flavour, the staff is nice and the prices are more than reasonable for the amount of food you get. The place is also very nicely decorated and creates a relaxed and modern atmosphere.

review_data.title: Great tacos and a lovely laid back atmosphere
review_data.content: A really relaxed and sociable place with outside seating. The staff are friendly but not over-attentive. Food is modern and fresh with a nice variety of creative flavours. A good place for lunch or dinner.

review_data.title: Highly recommended
review_data.content: Everything is excellent, the food, the service, the drinks, the music... LA Brea is the place to go in Zürich if you like Mexican food. 5 stars!

review_data.title: They look better than they taste
review_data.content: Very pretty place and the tacos were very nicely arranged. Sadly our tacos were rather cold and did not taste very special.

review_data.title: Aussergewöhnlich 😍
review_data.content: Kurz gesagt : Das Essen ist super lecker Die Drinks sehr grosszügig Die Mädels im Service äusserst freundlich & cool!...More

review_data.title: Very good but not amazing.
review_data.content: I was here recently with two other people. We ordered the dirty nachos, al pastor tacos, sticky orange chicken tacos and baja fish tacos with side orders of sweet corn cake and coleslaw. Overall the food was good except unfortunately for the al pastor tacos....More

review_data.title: good solid street tacos
review_data.content: Good solid street tacos. They focused on their signature dish and I really like the results. I recommend it!

review_data.title: Location: unweit des Hauptbahnhofs
review_data.content: Location: unweit des Hauptbahnhofs Essen: wir hatten beide Tacos mit Fleisch (beef und pork belly). Nicht sehr ansprechend angerichtet aber...More

review_data.title: Amazing Tacos. Service could be improved.
review_data.content: Tacos are really great. I was there with Mexican friends who confirmed that some of the tacos would be at the highest level even in Mexico. Not to miss: Tacos Al Pastor, tacos Barbacoa and Sweet Corn Cake side. It would get 5 stars if...More

review_data.title: LA Vibe in Zurich
review_data.content: Very nice TACOS with fresh ingridients veggie options and meat from local farms great service good drinks, awesome music we where very happy at this place💯🙌

review_data.title: Overpriced - nothing special
review_data.content: We visited this restaurant because we read a lot about it. We were disappointed... overpriced tacos, loud music, service was okay but nothing special. Would not visit anymore - there are better places in Zurich for tacos...

review_data.title: Mexican Eye-Opener!

review_data.title: Gibt besseres
review_data.content: Die Musik ist gut, die Tacos ok. Gibt sicher bessere Orte für Tacos in Zürich, wie Luchador oder La Taqueria.

review_data.title: Essen ganz gut... Tacos ganz
review_data.content: Essen ganz gut... Tacos ganz originell. Man konnte leider nicht aufessen, da man einen Timeslot bekommt 🙄

review_data.title: Best Tacos in Town
